citations.narrative:
The facility acquired 16 foxes on May 15, 2023. These foxes were offered for sale by the facility. The facility had one fox
on the premises at the time of inspection. The facilities classification of licensee does not allow sale or procession of foxes
or other wild exotic canines. A licensee must obtain a new license before using any animal beyond those types and
numbers authorized under the existing licensee.
Correct by: 8/28/23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
The facility acquired 16 foxes on May 15, 2023. These foxes were offered for sale by the facility. The facility had one fox 
on the premises at the time of inspection. The facilities classification of licensee does not allow sale or procession of foxes 
or other wild exotic canines. A licensee must obtain a new license before using any animal beyond those types and 
numbers authorized under the existing licensee. 
Correct by: 8/28/23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
